name: Floette
flavorText: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

attacks.name: Aromatherapy
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Magical Leaf
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.
